items.summary: Update the Navigation component at frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx to add useEffect hooks that explicitly watch for changes in the identity state from useInternetIdentity and trigger the useIsCallerAdmin query to refetch when authentication status changes from logged out to logged in

Ensure the useIsCallerAdmin query in the Navigation component is properly enabled and configured to run immediately when the identity state becomes authenticated, using the enabled option based on identity presence

Add refetch mechanism in Navigation component that manually triggers the useIsCallerAdmin query refetch when the actor instance changes or identity updates, ensuring the admin status check runs with the newly authenticated identity
